subject: CLAIMS,
body:

                                                 DRAW #966 WINNING NOTIFICATION!!!
We happily announce to you the draw (#966) of the UNITED KINGDOM
HIGHSTAKE ONLINE INTERNATIONAL LOTTERY, online Sweepstakes
International program held on 1st May 2007.Your e-mail
address attached to ticket number: 89475656545 112 with Serial number
4366/78 drew the lucky numbers: (23)-(00)-(23)-(28)-(89)bonus #
(45).Which subsequently won you the lottery in the 2nd category
i.e match 5 plus bonus. You have therefore been approved to claim a
total sum of 250,000 (Two hundred and fifty thousand pounds sterlings)
in cash credited to file KTU/9023118308/03.For security reasons, you
are advised to keep your winning information confidential till your
claims is processed.
To file for your claim, please contact our security/fiduciary agent:
Name of Agent: PETERS COKER City/Country: London, United Kingdom.
Email: onlineuknationallottery_peters@yahoo.co.uk
Telephone:+447011139934
You are also advised to provide him with the under listed information
as soon as possible: 1. Name in full    2. Address    3. Nationality
4. Age 5. Occupation 6. Phone/Fax.
Yours faithfully,
Peters Coker.
